text:
Maria Antonieta de Farias Portocarrero (August 23, 1922 – March 3, 2018), known professionally as Tônia Carrero, was a Brazilian actress. She was born in Rio de Janeiro. She was known for her movie role in "Tico-Tico no Fubá" and for her television roles in "Água Viva" and in "Louco Amor".
Carrero died in Rio de Janeiro on March 3, 2018 of post-surgery cardiac arrest at the age of 95.
